kvhc.gui

Class GUIStepButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • CheckBox
      • kvhc.gui.GUIStepButton

  • public class GUIStepButton
extends CheckBox
    GUIStepButton is a View representing a step.
    Author:
    Oscar/kvhc

      GUIStepButton(Context context, int channelId, Step step, boolean isActive)
      Constructor who also takes an boolean to decide if the button should be shown as active or inactive.
